features: POWERFUL MEN'S CREAM - WildPrime is a perfect face moisturizer for men who understand the importance of proper skincare and want to underline their natural handsomeness. You can use our face cream as a daily moisturizer and as an aftershave treatment. It will soothe rough skin and provide a nice smoothing and lifting effect, reducing signs of aging, and helping you to get a real eye-catching face.

QUICK AND VISIBLE RESULT - We are sure that the real men value real results, that's why we combined only proven ingredients beneficial for your skin. The powerful formula with Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamins A & E helps to keep your skin hydrated all day long and reduce the depth of wrinkles and fine lines. No need in multiple treatments - WildPrime is all a real men need for good-looking, healthy skin.

SMART NATURAL FORMULA - Our anti-aging face moisturizer has a pleasant non-greasy texture that does not clogs up pores. It contains no irritating fragrances and colors and works for all skin types, so you don't have to bother about exhausting researches of what would be effective for you exactly. WildPrime simply does what's promised, and that's why we are trusted by men all across the Country.

OUTSTANDING QUALITY - At WildPrime, we care about every jar of moisturizer for the face we create that's why each batch undergoes independent Third-Party tests for the accordance with safety and purity. We make our anti-aging moisturizer in the USA at a Certified Facility. Buying our cream, you can be sure that you're getting an exceptional product of a perfect, real American quality.

YOU ARE IMPORTANT - We value your experience with our face moisturizer for men more than anything else! Please, do not hesitate to share your opinion with us through review or messages. If you need our assistance or want to ask something - contact us directly. Our support team will be happy to help you and ensure that you are 100% satisfied and have only a positive impression of our cream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a great addition to your daily skincare routine
reviews.reviewText: Hey guys, I wanted to share my experience with Wilder's Prime Men's Face Moisturizer Cream. I've been using it for a few weeks now, and I have to say, I'm impressed.This cream is specially formulated for men's skin, which is great because let's be honest, our skin has different needs than women's. It delivers powerful anti-aging and wrinkle-fighting benefits, thanks to key ingredients like collagen and hyaluronic acid. And let me tell you, my skin feels smoother and more hydrated since I started using it.But it's not just about reducing fine lines and wrinkles – this cream also contains vitamins E and A, as well as avocado oil, which all work together to protect my skin from environmental damage and oxidative stress. And the fact that it's made in the USA with only the finest ingredients gives me peace of mind that I'm not putting any harsh chemicals or artificial additives on my skin.The formula is light and non-greasy, which is a huge plus for me because I don't like feeling like I have something heavy on my skin. And I love that it's perfect for use after shaving – it soothes my skin and keeps it hydrated all day long.Overall, I highly recommend Wilder's Prime Men's Face Moisturizer Cream. It's a great addition to my daily skincare routine and has definitely made a difference in the appearance and feel of my skin. So if you're looking for a high-quality moisturizer that's specifically designed for men's skin, give this one a try – you won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth Skin for the Win!!
reviews.reviewText: Hi! Wild Prime Moisturizing Anti-Aging Cream is a great skincare product to add to your daily routine. What I liked about the Cream was that it was unscented and really smooth and lightweight! I also love how easy it is to incorporate into my routine. It has great ingredients like Collagen, Vitamin A & E, as well as Hyaluronic Acid. My skin felt so soft and moisturized after using this cream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband used this product and really liked it! There’s not a strong scent which we both appreciate in a skincare product. It left his skin feeling hydrated and smooth. With longer use, we will be able to understand the anti aging effect better. I recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only one flaw with this product - bigger containers with more content
reviews.reviewText: As I get older, the crows feet started to creep in with my face looking a little worse for wear. I've used different moisturizers in the past, all of which worked well-enough but nothing as significant as the quality that seems to provide me. I use it after showering and drying off. It I use it everywhere on my face and neck with the exception of around my eyes (I use their eye moisturizer product for that).While I haven't been mistaken for being 10 years younger, it has made a significant difference in the quality of my skin, a reduction in the appearance of wrinkles and a general appearance of well-ness.Would like to see it in larger sizes. Definitely recommend this moisturizer and am keen to try more from the company's product line.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Better options for the price point
reviews.reviewText: The product isn’t bad, but I do believe there are better options for the price point. The container is smaller than I thought it would be and again, for the price point I was slightly disappointed. The texture is thick lotion-like. It doesn’t feel greasy on the skin which is a plus, but it does feel kind of heavy. I prefer to use it in the evening. The product itself is good, but the price point is unreasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best cream out there
reviews.reviewText: I waited to do a review until I had some time to use it. I love this cream.It’s smooth and has a soft, soothing smell. It doesn’t leave you feeling oily afterwards and it absorbs right into your skin. After a couple weeks, I noticed my appearance starting to change. It evens out my skin tone and tightens up the skin, giving a youthful glow.I’ve been trying to find the right cream for some time now so I was willing to spend money for the right product. Fortunately, this is a great price for the quality of the product. I cannot recommend this cream enough! You will love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality and moisturizing!!
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is amazing! I love how it’s very thick initially, but feels so lightweight after putting it on. I’ve tried it for a couple weeks now and can say my skin has felt HYDRATED. I also love the cute little jar it comes in! So perfect for travel. 10/10 recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing for Men
reviews.reviewText: This product is high in quality but offers the same luxury as its higher priced competitors. Goes on skin (face and hands) delicately while offering a soothing moisturizer to help combat dryness. It is highly recommended!
